_header: A good scholar if thou wilt be
Note:
Followed by 54 other proverbs, some in couplets, many single-lined; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 13.

OxfBal354.Transcription:
A good scoler yf þou wilt beArise erly & worship þe
                    trinite
OxfBal354.Note: In a collection of 55 proverbs in English and Latin.
